data.message:
Limits have been placed on Zaid Hamid. Your Page has been unpublished and it cannot be published again I think it was maybe an error and my page was about just news, and doesn't have any kind of that post which violates the Facebook policies. I have appealed on this issue but still didn't get any reply from your side, 
Anyway I'm sorry if maybe accidentally I have done something wrong which violates Facebook policies and I didn't read the new Facebook page policies. 

Please help me to publish my page again and you can also delete the posts from my page which are containing violations and against the policies. I assure you that i will be very much careful in this case and you people will not receive any further violation from my end. I have spend thousand of dollars on this page.Kindly Restore my Page. Thank you

replies.message: Hi Muhammad. Sometimes, we place limits on Pages that don't follow the Facebook Pages Terms. Learn more: http://bit.ly/2eseOpy. -Hannah

its my Asset and i have spend thousands of dollars on this page.I assure you that i will be very much careful in this case and you people will not receive any further spam against facebook page term from my end. Please Please Please remove these limits from my page.Thank You.
